rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKB2402, MKF2111, MKG2402, MKP2700, MKP2701, MKW2111, MKW2402}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {MKC2110%, MKF2111%, MKW2111%, MKW2402%}

description: A study of the factors that influence, explain and help predict consumption behaviour in both individuals and organisations. How concepts and theories developed in the social sciences provide the theoretical background to understand individual, cultural and group influences on the behaviour of consumers. Examines the use marketers make of this information in developing marketing strategies, predicting behaviour and influencing consumers.
